item.title: EP 625 - The Black Magic Murderers Who Hide Within The Trees
item.itunes:title: The Black Magic Murderers Who Hide Within The Trees
item.description:
Today we eat tacos on Friday in Sweden, and then we take a dark trip through the forest of murder!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

https://guardian.ng/news/suspected-ibadan-serial-killer-killed-another-woman-after-escape/

https://web.archive.org/web/20150531084317/http://www.punchng.com/metro-plus/ibadan-horror-soka-forest-yet-to-be-cleared/

That forest of horror in Ibadan

https://web.archive.org/web/20150704131844/http://dailyindependentnig.com/2014/04/that-forest-of-horror-in-ibadan/

https://www.vanguardngr.com/2014/03/true-face-horror-ibadan-bow-knife-expose-herdsmen-suspects/

Nigeria: Police probe Ibadan 'house of horror'

https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-26707586

Soka Forest of Horror in Ibadan - More Victims Might Be Underneath The Earth

https://web.archive.org/web/20150704192019/http://www.nigerianbulletin.com/media/soka-forest-of-horror-in-ibadan-more-victims-might-be-underneath-the-earth.274/media

https://www.informationng.com/2014/04/ibadan-horror-forest-eyewitness-recounts-what-happened-video.html

Nigerian 'House of Horror' riot in Ibadan

https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-26721112

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
